title: Review: iPad Pro and Air get premium leather protection with Nomad’s Modern Case and Folio
content:
Nomad recently launched its high-end Modern Leather Case and Modern Leather Folio for the iPad Pro and Air. Both feature a clean and minimal design without sacrificing protection. Read along for a hands-on look at Nomad’s Modern iPad leather collection – two great alternatives to silicone or plastic cases.

more…

The post Review: iPad Pro and Air get premium leather protection with Nomad’s Modern Case and Folio appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Check out a detailed look at the Nomad iPad Modern Leather Case and Folio – two premium options to protect your tablet.
